lead_paragraph: The promoters of the season-ending Champ Car World Series event, which was to be held Dec. 2 in Phoenix, have canceled the inaugural event because of a lack of sponsor support. The race was to have been run on a newly constructed street circuit.The Sports Property, the group that promoted the race, also promoted the season-opening race in April in Las Vegas. That event will continue.The cancellation means the Champ Car series will have no more races in the United States this season. The other races will be held in the Netherlands, Australia and Mexico.
